item.description:
Body Mind Systems, a comprehensive martial arts system with a school in Stoneham, Massachusetts, invites the public to its Self-Defense Seminar Fundraiser to benefit the National Multiple Sclerosis Society on Friday April 27, 2012 7:00 PM – 8:30 PM.

      Individual participants should bring a $20 suggested donation. 100% of the proceeds collected will benefit The National Multiple SclerosisSociety. Training includes hand strikes, safety tips, awareness development and understanding how criminals select victims. No prior experience is necessary. Reservations are required as space is limited. RSVP at http://www.facebook.com/ events/144918592301388/        “We welcome the opportunity to help the National Multiple Sclerosis Society,” says Bob Lee, a 3rd Degree Black Belt and a Head Instructor at the Stoneham school. “This event will be taught by school owner, 5th Degree Black Belt and Assistant National Instructor, John Hanley, with over 16 years of teaching and training experience. It’s a rare opportunity for the public to be taught by one of our highest level instructors.”       Body Mind Systems in Stoneham serves the communities of Stoneham , Reading , Woburn , Winchester , Wakefield , Melrose , Malden , Medford , Burlington , Saugus and Lynnfield.           ABOUT BODY MIND SYSTEMS        Body Mind Systems is a comprehensive martial arts training system teaching eight martial arts that encompass the foundations of all martial arts styles: kung fu, bagua zhang, tai chi, judo, kong su (taekwondo/karate), aikido, traditional Asian weapons and samurai sword. We use 1,500 years of refined martial arts knowledge to help men and women improve themselves physically and mentally. They learn to apply the principles of confidence, discipline, focus, willpower, patience and awareness through training in powerful forms, movement and practical self-defense to create a more successful, meaningful life. Body Mind Systems has schools in the Greater Boston area in Stoneham , Swampscott, and West Roxbury as well as New Milford , New Jersey . For more information, please visit our website at www.bodymindsystems.com or contact the school nearest you.

group.name: Boston/North Shore Martial Arts Meetup Group

item.name: Self-Defense Seminar Fundraiser (Benefits National Multiple Sclerosis Society)
